headline: Arista Networks (ANET) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why
summary: Arista Networks (ANET) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

raw.headline: Arista Networks (ANET) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why

headline: 3 Communication Stocks Set to Ride on Fiber Network & Cloud Focus
summary: Increased fiber densification, cloud focus and accelerated pace of 5G deployment should help the Zacks Communication - Components industry thrive despite short-term headwinds. ANET, GLW and HLIT are well-positioned to make the most of the demand for seamless connectivity solutions.
